gw.plugin.cluster

Interface ClusterBroadcastTransportCallback

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClusterChannelCallback

    public interface ClusterBroadcastTransportCallback
extends ClusterChannelCallback
    Callback interface used by broadcast transport plugins to notify the channel when notifications are received from other cluster members. User: akorostov Date: 2/28/13

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean receive(byte[] message)
      Called when a new notification is received.

      • Methods inherited from interface gw.plugin.cluster.ClusterChannelCallback

        getMembers, getServerId

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        boolean receive(byte[] message)
        Called when a new notification is received. This method should not throw any exceptions. All app level exceptions are already serialized to byte array by the cluster channel. However a transport must be ready to handle an exception, and must recover from it: e.g. the exception should not stop the listening thread(s).
        Parameters:
        message - message data.
        Returns:
        true if notification has been handled, false if ignored or caused an error.
